Uses of Package
bt.torrent.messaging

  • Packages that use bt.torrent.messaging 
    Package Description
    bt.peerexchange  
    bt.processor.magnet  
    bt.processor.torrent  
    bt.torrent.messaging  
  • Classes in bt.torrent.messaging used by bt.peerexchange 
    Class and Description
    MessageContext
    Provides basic information about the context of a message (both inbound and outbound).
  • Classes in bt.torrent.messaging used by bt.processor.magnet 
    Class and Description
    BitfieldCollectingConsumer
    Accumulates received bitfields and haves without validating anything.
  • Classes in bt.torrent.messaging used by bt.processor.torrent 
    Class and Description
    Assignments 
    MessageRouter 
  • Classes in bt.torrent.messaging used by bt.torrent.messaging 
    Class and Description
    Assignments 
    ConnectionState
    Contains basic information about a connection's state.
    GenericConsumer
    Consumer that is responsible for processing some of the very basic messages.
    IPeerWorkerFactory 
    Mapper
    Creates unique keys, that can be tested for equality with each other.
    MessageContext
    Provides basic information about the context of a message (both inbound and outbound).
    MessageRouter 
    PeerWorker
    Instances of this class are responsible for providing a messaging interface with one particular peer within a torrent processing session.
    TorrentWorker
    Manages peer workers.
